titles.title: A bill to amend the charter of the Gold Star Wives of America to remove the restriction on the federally chartered corporation, and directors and officers of the corporation, attempting to influence legislation.
Elevating the Voices of Gold Star Wives Act of 2019
Elevating the Voices of Gold Star Wives Act of 2019
Elevating the Voices of Gold Star Wives Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Elevating the Voices of Gold Star Wives Act of 2019
This bill removes a prohibition on the Gold Star Wives of America corporation, its directors, or its officers attempting to influence legislation.
